products.name: BLACK DOUBLE CAMEL
products.description:
THIS LS KAFTAN HIP IS HIP LENGTH WITH LONG, WIDE SLEEVES. IT HAS A LARGE HOOD WITH A V NECK AND SEAM RUNNING DOWN THE CENTRE FRONT AND BACK. IT IS A VOLUMINOUS KAFTAN SHAPE, WITH A WIDE SHOULDER FALLING INTO A DROPPED ARMHOLE.

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT DOUBLE CAMEL QUALITY IS WOVEN FROM FINE BABY CAMEL YARNS AND FINISHED BY WASHING AND TUMBLING. IT HAS A WARM AND SOFT HANDFEEL.

 

THE HIGH GRADE CAMEL HAIR USED IN THIS PRODUCT DERIVE FROM BACTRIAN CAMELS, A LONG HAIRED CAMEL NATIVE TO THE CENTRAL ASIAN STEPPES. INSTEAD OF SHEERING, THE HAIR IS COLLECTED BY BRUSHING THE CAMELS WHEN THEY NATURALLY LOOSE THEIR WINTER COAT.

products.name: HEADON PULL IN MILK ALPACA KNIT
products.description:
THIS HEADON PULL IS ABOVE HIP LENGTH WITH LONG SLEEVES. IT HAS A SLIGHT LUPETTO ROUND NECK, KNIT LEVEL SHOULDER SEAMS, LINE RUNNING DOWN THE CENTRE FRONT AND SIGNATURE KNIT CHANNEL RUNNING DOWN THE CENTRE BACK SPINE.

 

THIS A DENSE BUT LIGHT KNIT WITH A SOFT SLIGHTLY FLUFFY HAND.

products.name: DOUBLE CARGO JEANS IN COATED POPLIN
products.description:
THESE DOUBLE CARGO JEANS ARE FULL LENGTH 5 POCKET JEAN WITH A LOW-RISE AND A LOOSE FIT. THEY HAVE A SILVER BUTTON FLY, BELT LOOPS AND POCKET RIVETS AND THEY FEATURE TWO BEVELED CARGO POCKETS ON THE THIGH, WITH TWO SQUARE CARGO POCKETS BELOW, AND TWO SQUARE BACK POCKETS, ALL HAVE FLAPS AND TOPSTITCHING.

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT COTTON POPLIN HAS A SEMI SHINY WATER REPELLENT WAX COATING AND A CRISPY HAND FEEL. 

 

THIS FABRIC IS MADE USING GOTS CERTIFIED ORGANIC COTTON WHICH MEANS THE NATURAL FIBER IS GROWN WITHOUT HARMFUL CHEMICALS, LEAVING OUR SOIL, AIR AND WATER CLEANER FROM CONTAMINATES.

products.name: 14OZ HUSTLER SLUB DENIM
products.description:
THESE JORIS TROUSERS ARE FLOOR LENGTH. THEY HAVE A CONCEALED BUTTON FLY WITH RIVET, BELT LOOPS AND SIDE WELT POCKETS WITH RIVET DETAIL. THEY FEATURE A DISTRESSED RAW EDGE ON THE INNER RIGHT LEG AND OUTER LEFT HIP IN CONTRAST FABRIC.

 

THIS MEDIUMWEIGHT HUSTLER DENIM IS MADE ON A 14OZ JAPANESE INDIGO AND NATURAL SLUB DENIM WOVEN IN FUKUYAMA PREFECTURE BY A MILL FOUNDED IN 1893. THE READY GARMENT IS STONE WASHED WITH MINERAL DYES TO ACHIEVE THE HUSTLER WASH.

products.name: BELA PODS BLISTER LAMB LEATHER
products.description:
THESE BELA PODS ARE BELOW KNEE LENGTH SHORTS WITH A LOW DROPPED CROTCH. THEY HAVE AN ELASTICIZED WAISTBAND WITH DRAWSTRING, A BELA EXPOSED CENTER ZIP WITH TWO SNAP DETAIL AT BOTTOM, TWO SIDE WELT POCKETS WITH EYELETS AND TWO SQUARE BACK POCKETS WITH FLAPS AND SNAPS.

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT LAMB LEATHER HAS AN EXAGGERATED, UNEVEN BLISTERED TEXTURE AND A SOFT, FLUID HANDFEEL. THE BLISTERED TEXTURE IS ACHIEVED BY EXAGGERATING THE NATURAL GRAIN TEXTURE OF EACH SKIN, THEREFORE THE LOOK OF EACH SKIN IS UNIQUE.

products.name: BLIXA CAPE IN BLACK MELTON
products.description:
THIS BLIXA CAPE IS BELOW KNEE LENGTH AND SLEEVELESS. IT HAS A CONCEALED CENTRE FRONT ZIPPER AND FITS COMFORTABLY OVER THE SHOULDERS. ITS FRONT HARNESS AND CLIP ENSURE IT HOLDS IN PLACE. IT FEATURES TWO-WAY, ABOVE-ELBOW, BLIXA ZIPPERS, THAT GO FROM FRONT TO BACK. WHEN UNZIPPED THE ARMS CAN BE FREED FROM INSIDE THE CAPE. IT HAS SIDE POCKETS AND IS FULLY LINED AND HAS INTERNAL ZIPPERED POCKETS. 

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT AND COMPACT WOOL MELTON HAS A FLAT, MATTE FINISH AND A SOFT HANDFEEL.

products.name: HIGH NECK JACKET BLISTER LAMB LEATHER
products.description:
THIS INTARSIA JKT IS ABOVE THE HIP LENGTH WITH LONG SLEEVES. IT HAS A CENTER FRONT ZIPPER CLOSURE, A STAND COLLAR, SIDE FRONT JET POCKETS AND RIBBED CUFFS. IT FEATURES GEOMETRIC PANELS ON THE SHOULDERS AND SIDE FRONT, WITH TOP STITCHING.

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT LAMB LEATHER HAS AN EXAGGERATED UNEVEN BLISTERED TEXTURE AND A SOFT, FLUID HANDFEEL. THE BLISTERED TEXTURE IS ACHIEVED BY EXAGGERATING THE NATURAL GRAIN TEXTURE OF EACH SKIN, THEREFORE THE LOOK OF EACH SKIN IS UNIQUE.

products.name: TIGHT JKT CURLY SHEARLING
products.description:
THIS TIGHT JKT IS WAIST LENGTH. IT IS CLOSE-FITTING, WITH LONG, RIB KNIT SLEEVES, AND AN OPEN FRONT THAT SECURES WITH A LONG TIE THAT THEN WRAPS AROUND THE WAIST. IT FEATURES STRUCTURED, WIDE TATLIN SHOULDERS WITH A GIRDERED SHOULDER SEAM, AND YOKE THAT IS HORIZONTAL ACROSS THE CHEST AND DESCENDS DOWN THE ARM, TO FINISH IN A BLUNT POINT AT THE ELBOW.

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT SHEARLING LAMB LEATHER HAS A WAXY NAPPA FINISH AND A SOFT NATURAL FUR.

products.name: MEGACRUST STRETCH DENIM DRESS
products.description:
THIS SL ETNA DRESS IS FLOOR LENGTH AT THE SIDES WITH A CLOSE TO THE BODY FIT. IT FEATURES A WIDE, HIGH DRAPED NECK AT FRONT, THAT WIDENS INTO AN OPEN BACK NECK, AND HAS A ZIPPER DOWN TO THE BUTT. IT IS SLEEVELESS AND FEATURES TWO HIGH SLITS FRONT AND BACK AS WELL AS A FRONT AND BACK STITCH RIDGE DETAIL. 

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT STRETCH MEGACRUST DENIM IS GARMENT DYED BLACK AND TREATED WITH A WAX FINISH, THEN SEVERAL LAYERS OF BLACK FOIL IS PRESSED ON TOP AND A FINAL WASH MAKES THE FOIL PEEL AND CRACK.

 

THE NATURAL ASPECTS OF THIS TREATMENT MEANS THE FOIL HAS PEELED OFF AND CRACKED IN CERTAIN AREAS AND WILL CONTINUE TO DO SO WITH WEAR AND ABRASION. THIS IS AN INHERENT CHARACTERISTIC OF THIS TYPE OF TREATMENT AND IS A DESIRED A VISUAL ASPECT WHICH ADDS TO THE UNIQUENESS OF EACH PIECE.

products.name: SEB DRESS IN WASHED CUPRO
products.description:
THIS SEB DRESS IS KNEE-LENGTH, WITH A DRAPED BIAS CUT BODY, SHORT WIDE KIMONO SLEEVES AND A HIGH DRAPED COWL NECK THAT HAS AN ASYMMETRICAL OPENING AT BACK.

 

THIS MEDIUMWEIGHT WASHED CUPRO SATIN IS FLUID AND FINISHED WITH ENZYMES WHICH GIVES THIS FABRIC ITS PEACH HANDFEEL.

products.name: DEGRADE DRKDUST DEGRADE SLUB STRETCH DENIM
products.description:
THIS PRONG GOWN IS FLOOR LENGTH. IT FEATURES A STRAPLESS STRUCTURED BODICE WITH A BONED GEOMETRIC CUTOUT FRONT AND FOLDED BUST DETAIL. IT HAS A TIGHT FITTING SKIRT WHICH TAPERS SLIGHTLY TO THE ANKLE WITH A HIGH CENTRE BACK SPLIT, AND EXPOSED ZIPPER CLOSURE.

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT DRKDUST DEGRADE DENIM IS MADE ON A 10OZ JAPANESE INDIGO AND NATURAL SLUB DENIM. THE READY GARMENT IS STONE WASHED WITH MINERAL DYES AND THEN SPRAYED BY HAND TO ACHIEVE THE DEGRADE COLORATION.

 

THIS FABRIC IS MADE USING GOTS CERTIFIED ORGANIC COTTON WHICH MEANS THE NATURAL FIBER IS GROWN WITHOUT HARMFUL CHEMICALS, LEAVING OUR SOIL, AIR AND WATER CLEANER FROM CONTAMINATES.

products.name: 13OZ BLACK WASHED FOIL DENIM
products.description:
THIS SISYSNAP SKIRT IS MID-THIGH LENGTH. IT FEATURES A FUNCTIONAL SNAP CLOSURE AND DECORATIVE SNAP DETAIL ON RIGHT HIP. IT HAS SIDE POCKETS, BACK PATCH POCKETS, A RIGHT SIDE SLIT AND A RAW CUT EDGE AND HEM. 

 

THIS MEDIUMWEIGHT WASHED FOIL DENIM IS MADE ON A 13OZ JAPANESE BLACK AND NATURAL DENIM. THE READY GARMENT IS BLEACHED INTO A DIRTY PEARL COLOR, A BLACK FOIL OVERLAY IS THEN APPLIED AND FINALLY THE GARMENT IS WASHED TO ACHIEVE THE IRREGULAR LOOK.

 

THE NATURAL ASPECTS OF THIS TREATMENT MEANS THE FOIL APPLICATION IS IRREGULAR AND HAS PEELED OFF IN CERTAIN AREAS AND WILL CONTINUE TO DO SO WITH WEAR AND ABRASION. THIS IS AN INHERENT CHARACTERISTIC OF THIS TYPE OF TREATMENT AND IS A DESIRED VISUAL ASPECT WHICH ADDS TO THE UNIQUENESS OF EACH PIECE.

products.name: SLICED SKIRT IN NATURAL WAXY PIRARUCU
products.description:
THIS SLICED SKIRT IS FLOOR LENGTH AT SIDES. IT HAS A CENTRE BACK ZIPPER AND A CLOSE TO THE BODY FIT. IT FEATURES TWO HIGH SLITS FRONT AND BACK AS WELL AS A FRONT AND BACK STITCH RIDGE DETAIL. IT HAS SIDE SEAM POCKETS. 

 

THIS GENUINE PIRARUCU FISHSKIN HAS A SOFT, MATTE AND WAXY FINISH.

 

THE PIRARUCU IS ONE OF THE WORLD’S LARGEST FRESHWATER FISH. NATIVE TO THE AMAZON BIOME, IT IS TRADITIONALLY FISHED AS A FOOD SOURCE BY LOCAL COMMUNITIES AND THE SKIN IS WASTED. THE LEGAL CAPTURE OF PIRARUCU IS TODAY RESTRICTED TO SPECIFIC ECOLOGICAL RESERVES AND LIMITED IN ORDER TO PRESERVE THE SPECIES. BY RECYCLING THE GIANT SKINS, INDIGENOUS COMMUNITIES IN BRAZIL ARE ABLE TO RECEIVE A SIGNIFICANT INCOME FROM SOMETHING THAT WAS NORMALLY DISCARDED. TAKING CARE OF THIS BY-PRODUCT ALSO PROVIDES JOB OPPURTUNITIES FOR THE SAME COMMUNITIES AND FINANCES PART OF THE BIODIVERSITY PRESERVATION.

products.name: BANANA MINI IN WOOL DRILL
products.description:
THIS BOLAN BANANA MINI IS A HIGH WAISTED, SLIM FIT 6-POCKET JEAN SKIRT AND FALL HIGH ON THE THIGH. IT HAS A WAISTBAND WITH BELT LOOPS AND POCKET RIVETS AND CLOSE WITH A CONCEALED BUTTON FLY. IT FEATURES A LONG ZIPPER RUNNING FROM CENTRE BUTT, CURVING AROUND THE HIP TO THE SKIRT HEM. IT CAN UNZIPPER AT BACK TO EXPOSE THE BUTT AND ALSO UP FROM THE HEM TO EXPOSE MORE OF THE THIGH.

 

THIS MEDIUMWEIGHT WOOL DRILL FABRIC HAS A DISTINCT DRILL TEXTURE AND A DRY HANDFEEL.

products.name: TEC TOP IN WAX STRETCH DENIM
products.description:
THIS TEC TOP IS HIP LENGTH WITH LONG, SLIM SLEEVES AND A BODY HUGGING FIT. IT FEATURES EXAGGERATED TEC SHOULDERS WHICH RISE INTO RAW CUT POINTS AND A GEOMETRIC LINE DETAIL ON FRONT. IT CLOSES WITH A ZIPPER, WITH PULL TAB, ON CENTRE BACK. 

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT BLACK WAX DENIM IS MADE ON A 10OZ BLACK AND NATURAL STRETCH DENIM. THE READY GARMENT IS OVERDYED BLACK AND TREATED WITH A WAX FINISH. A FINAL WASH GIVES THIS GARMENT ITS SOFTNESS.

 

THIS GARMENT IS TREATED IN AN ITALIAN WASH HOUSE BASED IN THE VENETO AREA OF ITALY, THAT PRODUCES IN SMALLER TREATMENT BATHS TO REDUCE WATER WASTE AND UTILIZE A WATER PURIFYING PROCESS THAT ENABLES THEM TO RECYCLE A PORTION OF THE WATER USED. ALL OF OUR DENIM WASHES ARE ZDHC CERTIFIED.

products.name: CYLINDER TOP IN PEARL HEAVY CADY
products.description:
THIS CYLINDER TOP IS HIP-LENGTH, WITH A DRAPED BIAS CUT BODY, ELBOW-LENGTH WIDE SLEEVES AND A HIGH DRAPED COWL NECK THAT HAS AN ASYMMETRICAL OPENING AT BACK. IT GATHERS INTO THE WAIST AND FINISHES IN A TIGHT BODY TO THE HIP.

 

THIS MEDIUMWEIGHT CADY CREPE IS FLUID WITH A CRISP SURFACE TEXTURE AND A COOL SLICK BACKSIDE. 

 

THIS FABRIC IS MADE FROM FSC® - CERTIFIED (FSC - C162846) VISCOSE AND ACETATE WHICH ENSURES THAT THE FIBERS ARE PRODUCED FROM RESPONSIBLY MANAGED SOURCES AND NO DEFORESTATION OCCURS.

products.name: DARKDUST LIGHTWEIGHT RASATO KNIT
products.description:
THIS OVERSIZED CRATER IS BELOW HIP LENGTH WITH A JUMBO LOOSE FIT. IT FEATURES A HIGH RIBBED CREW NECK WITH SLIGHT COWL, A WIDE DROPPED SHOULDER AND ARMHOLE WITH LONG RIBBED SLEEVES AND A RIBBED HEM. IT HAS A SIGNATURE KNIT CHANNEL RUNNING DOWN THE CENTRE BACK SPINE.

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT AND CLASSIC STITCH WOOL KNIT HAS A SOFT HANDFEEL.

products.name: SCARF FLIGHT IN INDIGO INDIGO SUEDE
products.description:
THIS SCARF FLIGHT IS BELOW HIP LENGTH AND HAS LONG WIDE SLEEVES. IT FEATURES AN OFF CENTRE ZIPPER CLOSURE THAT CLOSES ON THE SIDE NECK AND IS COVERED BY AN ATTACHED SCARF SEGMENT THAT IS WORN OVER THE RIGHT SHOULDER. IT HAS A BELT AT WAIST HEIGHT THAT FASTENS WITH A BUCKLE. IT HAS SHOULDER SEAM FOLD DETAIL, A CONCEALED ZIPPED POCKET IN THE LEFT FOREARM AND SIDE SEAM POCKETS. IT IS FULLY LINED WITH INTERNAL ZIPPERED POCKETS. THIS VERSION HAS A FRINGED BACK AND SLEEVES.

 

THIS MEDIUMWEIGHT CROSTA COW SUEDE LEATHER IS MATTE WITH A HAIRY SURFACE TEXTURE. IT IS DYED USING NATURAL INDIGO AND WASHED SEVERAL TIMES TO ACHIEVE ITS FINAL LOOK. IT HAS A NATURAL AND WAXY HAND FEEL ACHIEVED BY DRUMMING THE SKINS WITH WAX.

products.name: DRACULIMO IN BLACK MELTON
products.description:
THIS DRACULIMO IS BELOW WAIST LENGTH IN FRONT AND LONGER IN THE BACK. IT HAS LONG SLEEVES AND A CENTRE FRONT ZIPPER. IT FEATURES AN EXTENDED LENGTH COLLAR THAT CAN BE WORN UP OR DOWN AND HOLDS ITS SHAPE THANKS TO IT BEING REINFORCED WITH FUSING MATERIAL. IT ALSO FEATURES A  FOLD IN THE BACK AND HAS A CURVED, SLIGHTLY LIFTED, FRONT HEM THAT ENDS IN POINTS AT THE SIDES. IT HAS TWO FRONT SIDE ZIPPERED POCKETS.

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT AND COMPACT WOOL MELTON HAS A FLAT, MATTE FINISH AND A SOFT HANDFEEL.

products.name: CYCLOPS COAT IN DRKDUST CURLY SHEARLING
products.description:
THIS SL CYCLOPS COAT IS BELOW KNEE LENGTH AND SLEEVELESS. IT HAS A DEEP ARMHOLES AND AN OPEN FRONT AND SIDE SEAM POCKETS. THIS VERSION IS REVERSIBLE.

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT SHEARLING LAMB LEATHER HAS A WAXY NAPPA FINISH AND A SOFT NATURAL FUR.

 

TANNED IN THE TUSCANY AREA OF ITALY, THESE SHEARLING MERINO HIDES ARE OF SPANISH ORIGIN, THE UNIQUE THICK FUR OF THESE ANIMALS MAKE THEM PERFECT FOR SHEARLING. BECAUSE THE HAIR IS NATURAL, THERE WILL BE VARIATIONS IN HAIR LENGTH AND TEXTURE, MAKING EACH PIECE UNIQUE.

products.name: GLOSSY BUTTER CALF LEATHER
products.description:
THIS GEMINI BAG IS A LARGE SOFT A-SHAPED BAG THAT SLOUCHES IN THE MIDDLE. IT CURVES OVER TO CREATE A STRAP THAT SECURES WITH A GEMINI DOUBLE ENDED SNAP HOOK ENGRAVED WITH THE RICK OWENS LOGO. THE BAG OPENS WITH A TOP ZIP, HAS AN INNER POUCH POCKET AND A FLAT POCKET WITH SIGNATURE U-SHAPED STITCHING DETAIL VISIBLE ON THE REAR EXTERIOR.

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT GLOSSY BUTTER FULL CALF LEATHER IS FINISHED USING ANALINE AND NATURAL OILS IN ORDER TO ACHIEVE ITS BUTTERY HANDFEEL.

products.name: BIG ADRI IN CALF LEATHER
products.description:
THIS BIG ADRI IS A RECTANGULAR POUCH WITH TOP ZIPPER CLOSURE, A PONTICELLO D-LOOP DETAIL AND A LONG, THIN, ADJUSTABLE LEATHER STRAP, WITH SMALL PALLADIUM TONE BRASS SNAP HOOKS AND D-RINGS.

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT GLOSSY BUTTER FULL CALF LEATHER IS FINISHED USING ANALINE AND NATURAL OILS IN ORDER TO ACHIEVE ITS BUTTERY HANDFEEL.

 

IT IS FINISHED BY HOT PRESS IN ORDER TO ACHIEVE THE SHINY SURFACE.

products.name: DARK DUST BLISTER LAMB LEATHER
products.description:
THIS ADRI IS A RECTANGULAR POUCH WITH TOP ZIPPER CLOSURE, A PONTICELLO D-LOOP DETAIL AND A LONG, THIN, ADJUSTABLE LEATHER STRAP, WITH SMALL PALLADIUM TONE BRASS SNAP HOOKS AND D-RINGS.

 

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT LAMB LEATHER HAS AN EXAGGERATED, UNEVEN BLISTERED TEXTURE AND A SOFT, FLUID HANDFEEL. THE BLISTERED TEXTURE IS ACHIEVED BY EXAGGERATING THE NATURAL GRAIN TEXTURE OF EACH SKIN, THEREFORE THE LOOK OF EACH SKIN IS UNIQUE.

products.name: TACO KISS IN CALF LEATHER
products.description:
THESE TACO KISS BOOTS ARE A DEFLATED VERSION OF OUR STRAYTUKAY COLLABORATION BOOTS. THEY ARE THIGH HIGH. THEY HAVE A TIGHT SOCK UPPER, JOINING TO A DIAGONAL SEAM LINE THAT SLOPES FROM MIDPOINT, OVER THE KNEE, DOWN TO THE CENTRE BACK CALF. THEY FEATURE A LEATHER UPPER THAT FLARES DOWN THE LOWER LEG, CURVING INTO THE BACK HEEL AND POINTING AT THE TOE. INSIDE THEY HAVE A 12CM CONCEALED WEDGE (6,5CM RISE) AND A THICK FRONT PLATFORM. THIS VERSION FEATURES THREE SNAPS ON FRONT, BELOW KNEE, TO ATTACH OUR INTRICATE LEATHER CHAIN MAIL, SOLD SEPARATELY.

 

THIS IS A COMBINATION OF STRETCH LAMB LEATHER AND FULL GRAIN CALF LEATHER.

 

THIS MEDIUMWEIGHT FULL GRAIN CALF LEATHER HAS A FLAT AND MATTE SURFACE FINISH AND IS SPECIFICALLY TANNED FOR SHOES WITH AN ABRASION-RESISTANT FINISH.

 

THIS TANNERY IS LWG CERTIFIED WITH A BRONZE RATING.
products.material: UPPER PART UPPER 65% LAMB LEATHER + 34% COTTON + 1% SPANDEX

products.name: FACTORY BOOTS IN BROWN NUBUCK
products.description:
THESE FACTORY BOOTS ARE MID-CALF HEIGHT. THEY HAVE A TOPSTITCHED SEAM ARCING OVER THE FRONT FOOT WITH STITCHING RUNNING OVER THE ANTERIOR ANKLE. THEY FEATURE AN ANGULAR HEEL COUNTER AND A BACK LOOP PULL TAB AND HAVE 14CM HIGH SHARK-TOOTH SOLE UNDERNEATH AND AT FRONT AND HAVE A SLANTING HEEL AND INCLINED TOE PLATFORM.

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT BULL LEATHER HAS A BRUSHED NUBUCK FINISH AND WAXY HANDFEEL. BECAUSE THIS SKIN IS NAKED, NOT FINISHED USING ANY PIGMENTS COVERING THE SKIN, NATURAL MARKINGS AND SHADINGS ARE VISIBLE WHICH MAKES EACH SKIN AND PRODUCT UNIQUE.

products.name: TIED TACO KISS IN WASHED CALF LEATHER
products.description:
THESE TIED TACO KISS ARE A SHORTER, DEFLATED, VERSION OF OUR STRAYTUKAY COLLABORATION BOOTS. THEY ARE ABOVE ANKLE HEIGHT. THEY FEATURE A LEATHER UPPER THAT FLARES DOWN FROM ABOVE ANKLE AND IS TIED WITH LEATHER STRAPS AROUND THE ANKLE, CREATING A SLIGHT DRAPE. IT THEN CURVES INTO THE BACK HEEL AND POINTS AT THE TOE. INSIDE THEY HAVE A 12CM CONCEALED WEDGE (4,5CM RISE) AND A THICK FRONT PLATFORM (7,5CM).

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT COW LEATHER IS VEG TANNED AND FINISHED USING NATURAL WAXES. A FINAL WASH GIVES THIS LEATHER ITS SOFTNESS AND BRINGS OUT THE NATURAL GRAIN TEXTURE OF EACH SKIN. BECAUSE THIS SKIN IS NAKED, NOT FINISHED USING ANY PIGMENTS COVERING THE SKIN, NATURAL MARKINGS AND SHADINGS ARE VISIBLE WHICH MAKES EACH SKIN AND PRODUCT UNIQUE.

products.name: BUMBAG IN BLACK SOFT BUFFALO
products.description:
THIS BUMBAG IS A LARGE BEVEL SHAPED FANNY PACK WITH ONE FRONT, DOUBLE ZIPPERED POCKET AND A SECOND ZIP POCKET ON BACK WITH SIGNATURE U-SHAPED STITCHING DETAIL VISIBLE ON THE BACK. IT FEATURES AN ADJUSTABLE COTTON WEBBING STRAP WITH A PALLADIUM TONE BRASS SNAP HOOK, SIDE RIVETS AND METAL D-RING DETAIL. THIS BUMBAG CAN BE WORN AROUND THE HIPS OR ACROSS THE BODY.

 

THIS MEDIUMWEIGHT LEATHER IS MADE FROM ITALIAN BUFALO HIDES AND FINISHED USING ONLY ANALINE TO KEEP THE LEATHER AS NATURAL AS POSSIBLE. THE GRAINY TEXTURE IS ACHIEVED BY TUMBLING THE SKINS MULTIPLE TIMES.

products.name: MEGA BUMPER LUNAR IN CURLY SHEARLING
products.description:
THESE MEGA BUMPER LUNAR ARE ABOVE-ANKLE HEIGHT. THEY HAVE A SOFT PADDED PULL ON BOOT UPPER AND DOUBLE HEIGHT, SHARK-TOOTHED MEGA BUMPER SOLES.

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT SHEARLING LAMB LEATHER HAS A WAXY NAPPA FINISH AND A SOFT NATURAL FUR.

 

TANNED IN THE TUSCANY AREA OF ITALY, THESE SHEARLING MERINO HIDES ARE OF SPANISH ORIGIN, THE UNIQUE THICK FUR OF THESE ANIMALS MAKE THEM PERFECT FOR SHEARLING. BECAUSE THE HAIR IS NATURAL, THERE WILL BE VARIATIONS IN HAIR LENGTH AND TEXTURE, MAKING EACH PIECE UNIQUE.

products.name: MELANGE GREY FELPA JERSEY
products.description:
THIS TOMMY T IS BELOW HIP LENGTH WITH A JUMBO OVERSIZED FIT. IT HAS WIDE, SHORT SLEEVES WITH A DROPPED ARMHOLE AND A RIBBED CREWNECK. IT FEATURES SIGNATURE FRONT LEVEL SHOULDER SEAMS AND A CENTRE BACK SEAM. 

 

THIS HEAVYWEIGHT COTTON AND POLYESTER BLEND MELANGE JERSEY HAS A SOFT HANDFEEL.
